info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 24 at 2:13AM PST until February 24 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 8 AM PST this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 8 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
